works.description: This Swarovski-studded screwdriver won’t do anything else but screws. Bosch made this limited edition Swarovski-studded IXO cordless screwdriver lately to celebrate the IXO becoming the world’s best-selling power tool, with 10 million units being sold since 2003. Only 2000 of this special edition screwdriver have been made, and each comes festooned with 470 Swarovski crystals.
